name: Marowak
description: They thump their bones rhythmically to communicate among themselves. There are nearly 50 different rhythmic patterns.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Bonemerang
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 damage for each heads.
